data.eml:eml: Two new species of Adontorhina Berry, 1947 (Bivalvia: Thyasiridae) from the Porcupine Bank, off the west coast of Ireland

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Barry, Peter J., Mccormack, Grace P. (2007): Two new species of Adontorhina Berry, 1947 (Bivalvia: Thyasiridae) from the Porcupine Bank, off the west coast of Ireland. Zootaxa 1526: 37-49, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177538
